titles.title: A bill for the relief of Reverend Carl T. Tinsley and Yvonne P. Tinsley.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 7/8/1987--Introduced. Authorizes two named individuals to bring an action against the United States for damages for the death of their son at Fort Benning, Georgia, in 1977.
